body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Dashboard
  • Network Count by Geography and Specialty
    • Network Count by Geography and Specialty, a new CSV format export, has been added to Competitive Dashboard.
    • The Competitive Dashboard module allows the user to select single or multiple networks, including All my networks, All competitor networks, or All project networks options.
    • Export detail can be configured to be at Provider Type or Specialty Group level.
    • Results can be grouped by geography type, allowing the user to customize the view.
      • County (default)
      • MSA
      • Custom Region
      • Rating Area
      • Zip

Issues Fixed

Compare Networks
  • Overlap Graphs labels are truncated
    • Fixed an issue where labels on Overlap graphs are sometimes truncated if the length of the bar plus the length of the stack numbers is close to the last grid line value.
